pages.text:
&n&6&lDimension:&r&r    &n&lNether&r
&n&6&lArea Level:&r&r    &n10 - 30 &r&r
&n&6&lEnraged Area Level:&r &n55 - 75&r
&n&6&lExceptions:&r  &nNone&r
&n&6&lQuests covered:&r  &nAct II;&r
&n&6&lDimension gateways:&r  &nAct II Gateway;
&n&6&lDimension Bosses:&r &nWarped Mosco, Wildfire, Mother Lava Squid, Wither, Awful Ghast, Nether Keeper&r

Dimension that is usually described as 'Hell'. Would make quite a hot vacation place, literally. Dimension is full of lava and hard to navigate so its highly recommended to acquire some form of fire resistance. A Paraglider would be of great use here, as well. Dimension has some weird magnetic interference making some of the structures like Keeping Castle or Awful dungeon impossible to find with a structure compass. But some adventurers speculate that they can help one to ascend.

pages.title: Getting into the Nether
pages.text:
If you are looking to get to this dimension you need to lay your hands on&n&l at least 10 Obsidian Blocks and fire source like Flint and Steel or Fire charge to light the center of the frame&r.
  &oCorner blocks are completely optional but they would grant &2+5 to Aestetics&r stat if it exsisted

pages.name: Nether Portal
pages.text: Click on eye icon to visualize portal in game
